text.0:
"6 principles to reduce casualties during #Covid19
Be 1st as the voice of authority 
Be right with the information you share
Be credible 
Be empathetic 
Promote action
Show respect
The #SRVQuiz is a great way to promote accurate information" @CDCKenya 

:backhand_index_pointing_right:https://t.co/bJjCyxQdFp https://t.co/wMMoir5KvJ
text.1: "In 2021, the quiz will include intermediate and advanced options. The intention is to evolve the platform further, with a possible focus on vaccine misinformation and eventually election communication." @MKaigwa https://t.co/3cmy6I0vs8
text.2:
2. Join our online #SRVQuiz launch happening today from 3pm to 3:45pm where you can listen to top Kenyan officials and expert fact-checkers including; 
1. @USAmbKenya 
2. @CDCKenya
3. @PesaCheck
4. @WKaigwa
